original_title: Du TGM au TGV, une histoire tunisienne
overview: The journey of the Jewish community of Tunisia who left for France in search of a new life. The documentary is based on archival footage and interventions of Tunisian Jews who deliver touching and poignant testimonies on the hidden face of exile. Beyond the difficulty of a new start in a new country, it is notably the repercussion of this uprooting on several generations that the film tries to bring to light.
title: Du TGM au TGV, une histoire tunisienne
